values: All Scripture Is Breathed Out by God — Continue in ItAll Scripture Is Breathed Out by God — Continue in It

In all your troubles, pain, joy, and pleasures, continue to stay in the Scriptures, because there’s no better way to invest than in God’s very words.In all your troubles, pain, joy, and pleasures, continue to stay in the Scriptures, because there’s no better way to invest than in God’s very words.
